author: Taegan Goddard
title: Is a Coalition Speaker Possible?
text:
Is a Coalition Speaker Possible? October 19, 2015 By Taegan Goddard 0 Comments 
Rep. Charlie Dent (R-PA), “the unofficial spokesman for moderation within his party, has said for days that the Republicans might well need Democrats to bail them out of their leadership crisis,” the Washington Post reports. 
Rep. Beto O’Rourke (D-TX) confirmed that there are “calls being made” but added, “It’s an unlikely outcome. Maybe it’s a plan B or plan C, but contingencies are being worked out.” Related Posts Never miss a Political Wire post Your email address: * Please enter all required fields Correct invalid entries
